message: I'm willing to be fair, but I think a 50/50 split is the most equitable. Let's start there.
I still think I deserve a bit more.
Let's be reasonable.  Inflation is hurting both of us.  50/50 is the fairest way to split the money at this point.
I'm still not convinced by 50/50. Inflation affects me more.
Alice, I'm willing to give you a slight advantage since you're hit harder by inflation.  But this offer is the best I can do right now.  We need to reach an agreement to get something.
